name: A Happy Man
description:
Watercolor and Pen in Paper

2021



 His name is August, he is born in August. He is three years now in the village and yet nobody knows his last name. He intended that way and he already make it clear that there is no heat follows his last name. Everyone’s fine with it.



He doesn’t do much unless sleep at night and wake up in the morning, then he prepares his small restaurant. When someone passes his by, he greets and smiles toward them. He understand that life is all about balancing chaos in it and he decided to not mind it at all. Sometimes, he drunk while working, just like in the picture, but it doesn’t affect him, only put bigger smile in his face. And no, his heart isn’t rotten, he only has a good intention.




I wish I could be more like him, I wish we could all be more like him.
